Product.MarketingTextHeader: Easy to use and reliable coffeemaker with a smart and compact design for easy storage.

Feature.FeatureLongDescription: Translucent water tank shows the water level in the tank
The drip stop prevents dripping coffee on the hotplate

Feature.FeatureGlossary: Detachable swing filter for easy filling and cleaning
With the cord storage you can keep your countertop neat and tidy
